duties_responsibilities.duty: Function as a Scrum Master/ Project Manager for the Member Provider Service MAPS team, including customer relationship management, call centers, and Blue View tool.
Lead 8-24 week projects in Agile and hybrid environments, ensuring flexibility in approach.
Manage project deadlines, affecting change in organizations working towards agile adoption.
Utilize Project Management tools such as ServiceNow, MS Project, Azure, JIRA, and collaboration tools for effective project management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in relevant field (Healthcare, Business, or related)
